xsl:when.test: lower-case(@extent)='1 or more pages' and lower-case(@desc)='missing'

transformation.desc: replace head tags with label tags for children of headnotes and tailnotes in ECCO
add 'text' parent to 'group' elements that lack them
convert @ref attributes to @facs attribute in ECCO texts
remove list[parent::signed] where it may not occur in TCP texts
replace 'orig' with value of @reg in EAF collection

xsl:element.name: revisionDesc
xsl:element.xsl:element: bpzPytlik Zillig, B. Conversion to TEI by Abbot

transformation.desc: convert 'text' element of quoted text to 'floatingText'
